title: Unified inbox email forwarding sets wrong sender, not the one who received the message
content:
Since I am having 10+ e-mail accounts in a TB 115.16.0esr (latest stable on Debian 12), I am using Unified Inbox where i can read all received mail under one "folder". Though when I do it and right click received mail, select Forward as > attachment (or just Forward), then the Thunderbird wrongly sets different account of mine as a sender instead of the one which received the message.

I need to always bother checking this and switching (sometimes i forget and send from a wrong accoung, which is also a privacy issue), which is annoying and I am unsure if I have misconfigured the TB or how to fix this? Thank you

title: Deletion of email messages so slow (pop)
content:
I am new to TB, I am based in the UK,.

My OS for now is Win 10 Pro, for years I have been receiving/sending my emails via " Windows Live Mail " but this will no longer be supported in upcoming Windows Upgrades.

I downloaded and set up TB, version 128.3.2esr 64bit and pretty much got it behaving as Live Mail did, my email account is POP3 protocol.

Some issues, the first, bulk deletion of unwanted emails.

I selected 80 emails for deletion/trashing, clicked the Trash icon, it took 42 minutes to complete, this cannot be right, I tried the compacting option which had no effect on speeding things up.

Trashing one email, its ok, three or over and the process is very slow.

How do I resolve this please?

title: 在thunderbird 128.3.1esr（64 位）版本中日历出现了不能拖拽的情况
content:

Has anyone ever encountered it?

title: Corrupted message | almost blank content
content:

'"--_010_AM9PR01MB741253DE32DF125557E6A8C4FD29AAM9PR01MB7412eurp_--"'

Its corrupted only in Thunderbird client on my laptop. When i open the same message on my phone or on different mail (web)client it works and if I forward message to myself it does show the content. There is no fixed condition or sender that implicates corruption. My Thunderbird is updated, senders have message format set to HTML or Plain Text. It started a while ago, but till then everything was working just fine. Also some messages that I send turn out to be corrupted. I haven't checked MIME yet. Antivirus works just fine with Thunderbird since installation. One and only extension added to Thunderbird is LookOut for opening .dat attachments sent from Outlook.

What should I do to retrieve info from all of those messages and to prevent them from corrupting in the future?
creator: kontakt151

title: Cannot empty Deleted folder and Thunderbird 128 is creating new folders. (reverted to 115)
content: I have been having problems with Thunderbird ever since I updated from Windows 7 to Widows 10 about 6 weeks ago. But these problems have become overwhelming recently. I have latest version of Thunderbird 128.3.2esr (64 bit). An unusual aspect of my setup is that I do not keep my Thunderbird profile on my C Drive but on another drive. I need to keep many of my emails so I have a large Archives with the emails kept by each year. I also have a large number of emails in Local folders from a previous email software I was using. Over the last few days I deleted a large number of emails from these Archive files to try to reduce the size of them. I also deleted a lot of emails from my current Inbox (as well as moving emails from there to Archives). But my Thunderbird has started to play up in ways I cannot understand: 1. Thunderbird has created about 10 new folders with names like Inbox-1, Inbox-2, Inbox.msf-1.compact-backup, etc. There is even a folder called Trash-1 2. Inbox-3 has one message in it which is one line of garbage - but the size of the folder is reported as 3.8GB! Inbox.msf-1.compact-backup has 1 message in it which is full of garbage and is reported as 6.1MB 3. My Deleted box got large in the process of doing the above. So I have emptied it several times. But the size of the Deleted box keep growing and has now reached 102 GB! I have compacted the Deleted Box and it does nothing. 4. Multiple copies of some of my emails are turning up in my Inbox - some as many as 6 or 7 copies. As a result the size of my Inbox keeps growing. I tried using a Thunderbird Extension that removes duplicates but, although it correctly identified all the duplicates, it stopped functioning when I clicked OK to remove the duplicates. 5. Needless to say that Thunderbird also at times excruciatingly slow and frequently freezes (with "(Not responding) showing on the Thunderbird window. 6. At one stage there were 1000s of message which were dated 1/1/1970 and were blank. I think I have deleted most of those. Using Windows Task Manager, I can see that CPU and Memory usage are always blow 50%. The Disk that the Thunderbird profile is on is sometimes at 100% and sometimes at a low %. But this does not seem to correlate with what I am actually doing. For example right now as I am typing this message, it is showing 100% active time and disk transfer rate of 450kb/sec but I am not doing anything with Thunderbird and the Thunderbird Activity Manager is showing no activity. But another time I could be trying to delete or move emails and it shows a low % of active time on that disk. I have looked through this support site and tried the following suggestion: I have put the Thunderbird profile in the exceptions section of my Antivirus software I have deleted global-messages-db.sqlite and allowed Thunderbird to rebuild indexes I have disabled all extensions as well as the extension I mention above for removing duplicates. I tried opening Thunderbird in Troubleshoot Mode and Windows in Safe Mode. Thunderbird operated more quickly but the problems did not resolve. Bewildering? I have been using Thunderbird for 10 years but after 6 weeks or so of problems and many frustrating hours, I am looking around for alternative email software but I don't want to go to Outlook. Does anyone have any suggestions for email software that can deal with large Archives?
creator: moojanmomen

title: Profile Corruption - Login Failures - Security - Email Account Blocked
content:
I use the latest version of Thunderbird on MacOS Sonoma 14.6.1. I have had a strange login/security issue twice in the past two weeks.

First activity in the morning about 10 days ago I noticed Thunderbird displaying many "Unable to get email, password incorrect messages" stacked on top of each other. Other native email clients on my other Apple devices were also unable to retrieve email. I contacted the email provider and they said the account was sending spam and they had blocked the account. They could offer no other information, such as whether the account had been hacked or password changed. After going through their security protocols they were able to restore the account and I changed the account password, from a reasonably strong 6 random characters to very strong 16 random characters with multifactor authentication enabled. After restarting Thunderbird, it was not possible to set the client password and get the client to function. I restored the profile from an older backup, copied the current mail folders into it, started Thunderbird, set the email password, and it started functioning again.

Today, about ten days later, first activity in the morning again found Thunderbird in the above state with numerous stacked password incorrect messages. However, this time email is functioning on my other devices, and I was able to login normally to my email provider's administration system. Perhaps the timing was such that the provider had not yet detected an issue and frozen the account.

This would lead me to believe that something on my Mac or associated with Thunderbird was responsible for the issues I am having. Multiple scans of the computer with Malewarebytes finds no viruses on the system. All help is appreciated.
creator: pete48

title: casella IMAP, all'improvviso il Mittente è diventato lo stesso per tutte le email in arrivo e già ricevute sin dal 2010.
content:
Chiarisco quanto in oggetto, casella di posta PEC, tutte le email, quindi anche quelle già ricevute dal 2010 mostrano lo stesso mittente, questo chiaramente non risponde al vero: Da: piripacchio@pec.it A: mioindirizzo@pec.it Mittente: raccoltadati@postacert.istat.it

Ecco nel dettaglio, Da: dovrebbe essere uguale a: raccoltadati@postacert.istat.it, ed apparire come tale nella colonna Mittente per le email speditemi, invece tutte le email hanno come mittente piripacchio@pec.it anche se piripacchio@pec.it non mi ha inviato alcuna email.

piripacchio@pec.it è presente nella casella altroindirizzopec@pec.it.

Ho provato a fare: click su casella, proprietà, informazioni generali, Ripara la cartella. Poi, Compatta ma senza alcun risultato. Versione in essere 128.3.2esr (64 bit) Altre informazioni, il provider è intuibile dagli esempi fatti, lo segnalo perchè un amico mi ha segnalato la stessa anomalia, circa 15 giorni fà, magari è utile, grazie per il tempo che mi dedicate.

title: I contunue to get an error message #2147500037. I have an Open Table account and Mozolia
content:
This has been going on since early October. Now the errors keep stacking up as I book new Open Table Reservations. 

        I got the error message after I was asked to add to my calendar [I don't use google]. see attached         Now when I log on to Thunderbird, I get message #1. If I dismiss it I get Message #3. If I click details in message #1, I get message #2, then I will get message #3 again when I try to clear. Also every 15 minutes after I log on to Thunderbird I get the little beep and another round of Message #1 and #3 dismiss starts all over again. It goes on for hours.           First I contacted Open table and they determined that it's not being caused by Open Table.

Then I found the error message #2147500037 on Thunderbird's platform so it's a thunderbird error. 

         I have deleted Thunderbird and re-established it. It didn't help. I tried the calendar date reset, but that's not my system so didn't work.

Edward Rowan ER.Irish2@gmail.com
creator: ER.Irish2

title: Thunderbird continually downloading files
content:
Thunderbird has become almost impossible to use, due to Thunderbird frequently freezing and displaying "Not Responding" messages. I'm not sure whether I have unknowingly caused this problem.

Each time I start Thunderbird, a scrolling message at the bottom of the window shows emails being downloaded. It seems Thunderbird is downloading all emails (see graphic) from the server when most are already displayed in Thunderbird, and I only need the latest emails. I use imap. I'm unable to stop the emails downloading to verify if that is the cause of my problem or whether the downloads are a normal action.

Why are emails being downloaded and how do I stop them? When I delete an email, is it deleted from the Gmail server as I need to reduce space in Gmail. Thanks
creator: user155627372899571801113696601033248903160

title: Size of the inline images at a received message
content:
I have used the userChrome.css file to change the width of the messages container. The only css that I have used is this:

hbox#messagepaneboxwrapper #messagepanebox #messagepane { 

   margin: 0px auto !important;    max-width: 680px;    width: 100%;

}

The issue is that when I open an email I received, sometimes the inline images are having a width 100% of the parent container (when I first open the message after the TB restart for first time), as they should be and sometimes the inline images are having their actual size.

In the first case the img element has the parameters overflow and shrinktofit as TRUE img src="imap://................@imap.gmail.com:993/fetch%3EUID%3E/INBOX%3E33514?part=1.1.2&filename=Screenshot%202024-10-13%20at%2017.50.33.jpeg" alt="Screenshot 2024-10-13 at 17.50.33.jpeg" overflowing="true" shrinktofit="true"

In the second case the img element has only the parameter shrinktofit as TRUE img src="imap://................@imap.gmail.com:993/fetch%3EUID%3E/INBOX%3E33514?part=1.1.2&filename=Screenshot%202024-10-13%20at%2017.50.33.jpeg" alt="Screenshot 2024-10-13 at 17.50.33.jpeg" shrinktofit="true"

I'm attaching 3 photos where you can see how the photos are handled differently when I open the message, close it and then reopen it. In addition, in the case of fulled sized photos, the cursor does not change to a zoom lens when passing over them and I can not zoom-in or zoom out them.
creator: ddimokas

title: add second smtp server
content: Well. Had my own mail server for going on 25 years. But i decided to switch my mail over to proton mail using my domain. I just cannot justify the server cost for only email. So anyway in Thunderbird i had google smtp and my servers smtp so i could send mail from different accounts. when switching over to proton i went to delete my old server smtp server info leaving only the google smtp server. Then i tried to add a new smtp server with the data protonmail provided and clicked save and it refuses to add a second smtp server. I am stumped as i tried to readd my old smtp server and it will not allow me to add that either. any ideas ?
creator: wulfman11
